text.autoconfig.stringlights.option.ligh: Effects how much the chain hangs.
Lower numbers equals more a bigger curve.
Collision will update on new lights or world loading.
text.autoconfig.stringlights.option.show: Show tooltip over chain items that are compatible with this mod.
text.autoconfig.stringlights.option.maxC: Effects how long a light can be.
§nWarning§r: Long lights can sometimes become invisible!
text.autoconfig.stringlights.option.qual: Effects the visual quality the light.
text.autoconfig.stringlights.title: Connectible Light Configs
